title.narrative: Enhancing Incomes through Sustainable and Inclusive Forestry (EISIF)

description.narrative: The organisation has supported the creation of a lobby platform in Nakuru County where 3 affiliate associations presented a lobby proposal to the County Government in relation to high/double taxation and is awaiting feedback from the governor. Formation and registration of a new cooperative for central Kenya with 320 members (40% being women). This brings the total number of Cooperatives within FF-SPAK to 3. The 3 Cooperatives have started marketing members produce with Kisii selling wood fuel worth Kshs 520,000, Central Highlands Tree Growers Association(CHTGA) Kshs 32,000 and Western Tree Planters Association(WETPA) Kshs 552,243. FFSPAK has engaged in resource mobilization whereby 2 proposals have been funded. Soil Association has funded FF-SPAK KES 1.5M for Certification promotion in 2018. Farm and Forestry Facility will be funding FF-SPAK up to 15M starting 3rd Quarter of 2018 up to 2022. FFSPAK was Selected as a secretariat for International Family Forest Alliance from June 2018. baseline survey at household level done and report under progress to inform the baseline and setting targets. 47 Village Savings &Loans Associations formed with 656 members( 428 being female)and a toal savings of Kshs 3,142,800. one of the VSLA group in Western part called" Mama Ufungua"(Meaning "Women hold key to success" with a membership of 28 women and a savings of Kshs 365,526 recently transformed into a rural Sacco. FFSPAK is currently the host secretariat for the International farm forestry umbrella body for smallholders.

To strengthen the capacity of member organisations to enable farm forestry producers improve their livelihoods through; facilitating exchange of experiences and information and encourage networking among farm forest producers associations, providing for a voice for Kenyan forest policies, laws and regulations from a farm forestry perspective, Capacity building for member associations and awareness creation on farm forestry, promoting farm forestry, promoting commercialization of farm forestry in order to increase income levels and enhance rural livelihoods.

participating-org.narrative: Farm Forestry Small Holders Producers Association

activity-date.narrative: Planned end date of the activity
Planned start date of the activity

receiver-org.narrative: Farm Forestry Small Holders Producers Association
